LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.LetterTextLaborersAr: The laborers from [permitFaction_name] have arrived. A shuttle will come to collect them in [laborersDurationDays] days.
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.LetterTextShuttleArr: A shuttle has arrived to collect the laborers from [permitFaction_name].
LanguageData.Permit_CallLaborers.LetterTextLaborerDie: A laborer sent to you by [permitFaction_name] has died. Your goodwill with [permitFaction_name] has fallen by [goodwillPenaltyPawn].
